item.title: Book Exercises - Manning Functional Programming in Scala - Pattern Matching
item.description: A few of us in work working towards getting through all the exercises from Manningsâ€™ Functional Programming in Scala. Chapter 3 presents using Pattern Matching and dives right in with some tough exercises.

item.title: Book Selection - Reactive Design Patterns
item.description: Our company set up a book club recently where our loose plan is that we are going to try and read an IT book once a month. This month we decided on Reactive Design Patterns. Will keep you posted how we get on.
